title: T3RM Portfolio
description: A terminal-style portfolio website with interactive CLI navigation

title: Meshery
description: Cloud native management plane that enables the adoption, operation, and management of cloud native applications and infrastructure.

title: Non-Native English Accent Classifier
description: A VGG16-LinearSVC based Deep-Learning model designed to classify the accents of non-native English Indian speakers based on the audio amplitude and MFCC features present at the given time interval.

title: Prediction of Stocks using CNN-LSTM
description: A ML project which uses CNN-LSTM Neural Network that combines features of CNN and LSTM models to predict the stocks with great accuracy.
